primarySpeakers.name: Alice Johnson
primarySpeakers.title: CTO at Tech Innovations
primarySpeakers.bio: Alice has over 20 years of experience in the tech industry, leading teams to develop cutting-edge solutions. She is passionate about AI and its potential to transform the world.

primarySpeakers.name: Bob Smith
primarySpeakers.title: AI Researcher at Future Labs
primarySpeakers.bio: Bob specializes in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with numerous publications in top journals. He is dedicated to advancing AI ethics and responsible technology development.
